name: postgres_database_agent
description: PostgreSQL database troubleshooting agent for diagnosing connectivity, performance, configuration, and replication issues.
use_cases: Performance issues (slow queries, high CPU, memory)

name: k8s_agent
description: Kubernetes troubleshooting agent for diagnosing pod, service, endpoint, and infrastructure issues.

name: incident_agent

Gathering multi-layer diagnostics (database, k8s, OS, storage)

name: research_agent
description: Web research agent for finding current information about software versions, release notes, CVEs, best practices, and documentation.
